extendedIngredients.name: mint
extendedIngredients.originalString: 3 small orange wedges and a sprig of mint for garnish

recipes.title: Drink the Book: Descanso Beach Smash
recipes.instructions: Procedures                                                                              1                                                                            Add the lemon slices and mint leaves to your shaker and muddle well.                                                                                                                            2                                                                            Add ice and all remaining ingredients (except the garnish). Shake well.                                                                                                                            3                                                                            Strain into a double old fashioned or wine glass filled with ice. Garnish with the orange wedges on a pick and the mint sprig. Serve.

steps.step: Add the lemon slices and mint leaves to your shaker and muddle well.
Add ice and all remaining ingredients (except the garnish). Shake well.
Strain into a double old fashioned or wine glass filled with ice.
Garnish with the orange wedges on a pick and the mint sprig.
